MzRegistryOptimizer.l1: Over time data becomes scattered within the registry file and when information
MzRegistryOptimizer.l2: is deleted from the registry, holes are left which fragment the data within the registry.
MzRegistryOptimizer.l3: Mz Registry Optimizer, optimizes your registry by removing gaps and wasted space.

Mz7Optimizer.cpu1b: Increase IRQ priority of the CMOS real-time clock
Mz7Optimizer.cpu1c: Force Windows to redetect processor's features on the next Windows startup

Mz7Optimizer.cpu2c: Foreground applications will be more responsive

Mz7Optimizer.mem1d: Increase additional worker threads for the running processes
